name: Grilled Fish With Tomato Cilantro Vinaigrette
keywords: cilantro leaves, tomato, tuna, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, main course
recipeIngredient: Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Either grill fish over medium-hot coals outdoors or broil it in the oven. Measure fish at thickest point and cook it 10 minutes to the inch.
Whisk oil with vinegar and mustard. Stir in scallions, cilantro and tomatoes. Season with pepper.
When fish is cooked, spoon some vinaigrette onto each of four dinner plates; arrange fish on top, and top with additional vinaigrette.
